The passengers are in a complete state of confusion, but the driver is calm so one hand, and he's got one hand on the steering wheel, and the other hand's holding a bottle of beer and every now and then he takes a swig. There's a stalker just woke up, for crying out loud says you learnt to drive somewhere, and the driver laughs. Ha-ha, that's it, I used to take a minibus in Kiev was working.

One day, one of the majors got fed up with his free life, he wanted to take it to the extreme. He's stocked up on the finest armour he can find, bought the coolest Volena, put everything on it only you can. The nuts are platinum, I told you. Anyway, I'm all dressed up. So I went to the zone. Brazenly drove through a roadblock, sentry on the move a bundle of quid, he's driving through the Henose zone from the throats blaring, speakers blasting some pop. In general, as usual, feels like the master of life. And there's a friend, oops, a gruff voice in my brain. Hey, kid, you got a smoke?

An account, then, of an experienced stalker on eyelids, how it is in the zone live. How do you do what to keep unpleasant situations out of your life? Young asks, and imagine such a thing. We're walking through the zone, and there's a lot of people coming from all directions monsters, all of them, and we've only got one a round for two, in your barrel. What will you do then? You shoot yourself and leave me to be slaughtered, or shoot me and you'll have to find a way out of it yourself. Old stalker without thinking, shit question. You, of course, for carping.

A drunken stalker crawls in in bar crawls in, turns round against the wall and starts crawling upwards. He climbs to the ceiling, then slides down the other wall to the counter. Orders a bottle of vodka, takes a drink, pulls it out of his rucksack artefact, snacks. After that, he turns around and crawls out of the bar. One stalker was stunned, so he says to the other, did you see, and he's like, aaaah, he's got a bite, motherfucker. It's not the same old days as a decent stalker snorting an artefact.

Stalker comes home late at night, drunk, sensible, his wife, drinking with girls in pubs again, Stalker, Come on, what girls? A coloson patrol, spotted at a roadblock, three hours of snooping, if I begged to be let in. And you're the one who's been making a fortune in vodka, you bastard. What kind of profiteer was he? I was getting the radiation out, not taking it home. So Stalker is justifying himself, but his wife won't stop. All right, but for the nipples on your neck. And it's the bloodsucker, jumping out of the corner and grabbing him, and all I had on me was a gun, so I got away, when his wife hits him over the head with a frying pan. You bastard, next time you meet your bloodsucker, tell her that lipstick's out of style.

Two rookies went into the zone. Before they could take a couple of steps, a bloodsucker attacked them. At the party, of course, they asked for weapons, and they were scared, and they'd go off in different directions. The bloodsucker picked one of them out and chased after him. He's up the tree, and the bloodsucker's after him. The second newcomer comes back, grabs the gun, and starts shooting at the bloodsucker. Bang! The bloodsucker's got his balls right side up. The creature roars more, but goes further up the tree. There it is again, bang, left the balls to the side. The bloodsucker's bleeder is cured, but he's still climbing up, only angrier. Bang! Bloodsucker's got the bloody last reason for the blood, but he still won't stop. That's when the first newcomer from the top of the tree yells at the greenhouse. He shoots him in the head, he's not gonna rape me, arsehole.

He was drunk, I'll fucking admit it, commander, and if I'd been sober I'd have moved on with my life, past you dickheads I wouldn't go with a hubor.

He thinks I've heard of it, but I've forgotten about it. I'll have to ask the men at the bar what the hell it is so ugly, the pubs and the girls.

He turns round, and there he is, whoops! Bloodsucker's standing there, squelching him, so what are you yelling about, huh? Well, the lardass is already in his trousers, understandably, and the case is pissed, but he's still answering. I'm this, this is his. Confused! I'm shouting to see if anyone can hear me So the bloodsucker licked all his tentacles and he says, pretty much. Well, I heard, so what do we do now?

Well, the lardass is already in his trousers, understandably, and the case is pissed, but he's still answering. I'm this, this is his. Confused! I'm shouting to see if anyone can hear me So the bloodsucker licked all his tentacles and he says, pretty much. Well, I heard, so what do we do now?

Caught, stalker mercenaries. Walked up to the well, dipped his head around his waist. After a minute, they pull it out and ask. Artefacts, dough, got any? He's not. Put it down again. Pestered, they ask. Artefacts, dough, got any? I don't. Dunked again, and asked again. Artefacts, dough, got any? But he couldn't take it. Man, you guys go deeper than that. Or keep it longer. I can't see shit. I can't see shit.

A flimsy stalker returns home at three o'clock in the morning. So the wife is waiting with a frying pan. Stalker crawled into the flat, got the nut, threw it in the direction of the loo, puked it up, crawled over there. The wife watches in silence. Stalker threw up, lunged off the toilet, pulled out a nut, darted towards the bedroom, darted, darted, darted. Then his wife hits him over the head with a frying pan. Stalker passed out once, then regained consciousness, and instead of marking a new anomaly, he's mumbling. That's lucky.

Sneaking through the streets of Pripyat two stalkers. One is experienced, the other is a novice. Well, Navechok is constantly checking the map. Old-timer, yours is cooking. At one of the crossroads, an old-timer slaps himself on the forehead. I ripped out the map for eternity. I'll take a look. That's right. Come on, rookie. Come on, let's sneak over to that house over there. We got through. Experienced. Now let's get in that front room. Come in and share the stairs the former, he says, Whoa, whoa, whoa. Breaking down that door. Pochok takes a run at the door. Come on, old boy, let's go in the kitchen. Breaking the hood. Navechok is trying to pull the bars off the wall. Puffy you ask so respectfully. Hey, what's an artefact that I can't do it myself? carry? I told him what the hell an artefact was. I cooked in this flat, I lived, about ventilation, vodka, vodka wasted hiding. Come on, break it quickly.
That's the way to get me!
You've had enough, you know that?
I got your back! We're out!
Give him a light and I'll go round!
I've got eyes on the enemy!
Did you see how I did?
Points for three, you're shooting at your own!
You're planting your own, you idiot!
Watch where you're aiming, you idiot!
You're a freak! Hands out of your arse!
What the fuck are you doing?
You bastard! A grenade for you!
Looks like we're done! Everybody rest!
Keep your head down! There might be new ones!
For now, stay put, take your time!
Hey, you! Don't think, you haven't left us yet!
We're looking for him, we're looking for him!
Scour the place, look behind every bush.
Come out, don't hide! Die like a man!
You can't hide from us! We're gonna cut you down!
That's it, you bastard, you're dead!
You can't get away from me!
You're a dead man, you prick, you understand?
You bastard, I'm gonna get you!
You don't want to be a rat? Do you need a hand?
Look at you! Tremble some more!
Be thankful I don't spare bullets!
Don't panic, bro! I'm a good doctor!
I've got a first aid kit, I'll fix you in one go!
I'll get you back on your feet, no problem! I'll get you back on your feet, no problem!
Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you, bro!
Where's the laughing, don't you get it?
Yeah, when you tell a joke, you have to tell a bearded one.
That's like honey on a stick!
Ha-ha-ha-ha! You're so full of it!
HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA
I don't know, maybe this kind of income is not suitable for some people, and it looks fine to me. You know, it's not just lugging stuff around, it's an idea.

I'll never part with my gun. I hold her in my arms during the day, I sleep with her at my side. I'm with her, he, talking even. Well, let them think she's crazy, she can do it a thousand times over saved my life.
I still don't understand how things work in the zone. The bosses are smart, trying to figure it out. And my small business is running around the swamps with a machine gun.
I'd like to learn! I'd be doing all sorts of research too, that's all, he'd walk around in a cool spacesuit like that too.
The main thing is not to drift, you don't know where your destiny will take you they'll abandon you tomorrow, maybe you'll remember these days as the happiest.
It's not like wandering through the woods for loot. There's less competition, and there's a purpose, except maybe is not the right thing to do.
My point is, complaining about fate is not going anywhere is fine. You have to do your job, and you have to do it better than everyone else the rest of them. That's it.
It's the same old thing, just back and going somewhere else again.
Nothing, nothing, I'll introduce tourists to the places of military glory. I'll be showing them the butt of my gun.
What's our bosses been up to lately? Seems to be enough equipment, guns too. What else do they want?

You think about it sometimes, we get paid for our work, with our bosses It's understandable, they want concrete results, but isn't there something behind all this? something more, or who the hell knows what.
Meaning, meaning, personally, I don't think much about meaning. There's a task at hand, you get paid normally for doing it, that's the point with motivation.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha....
Life's been a little hectic these days. You never know what surprise is behind the bush. Yes and in the contentment of work is not the same, not anymore.
Everything is flowing, everything is broken, and nothing changes. Today we sit quietly, eat vodka, and tomorrow I've got somewhere to be. To get materials.
No argument, the bosses know best. And yet one still wants to know sometimes what we're all in it for.
What kind of people are these people? They're always wanting to get to the bottom of things, you know. And you catch it, the truth.
We all complain about our lives. Thank God we're not running around with stone axes. We can take care of ourselves if we need to.
I take it that since the bosses are out there researching something, there must be some specific purpose. And what's in it for us, we're backed up armed very, as they say, very dangerous.
Yes, you can twist it or not twist it, you can make it work the way the commanders say, or as the zone decides.
Hey! What do you want, Stalker?
Hey, Stalker! What do you think?
All right, no kidding, put the gun away!
Yes... Who doesn't get in the zone?
You don't want to, how do you want to?
We probably don't know how to talk.
Are you out of your mind or something?
Oh, what a bore, doesn't say a word!
Oh, shit! Another log that's not mine!
Put the gun down, then we'll talk.
Put the gun away if you want to talk.
Take it off the first gun, then we'll talk.
You got business with me, or what?
What are you waiting for? Speak up!
Well, how long do I have to wait?
Hey, you! Did you fall asleep?
That's good stuff. I'm telling the truth. It's good. Anything you want, I swear.
They're hanging their ears, the herd.
We're going to find myths Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm

Two stalkers meet one day. One to the other. Vass, do you remember? Well, the one who told everyone how he got into flying school three times. I remember. Why? Well, he got into a ski-jump the other day. Oh, man, that's it. A man's dream has been forgotten. He flew!

Niva and the Stalkers are flying through the zone, an anomaly is bypassing them at breakneck speed, taking oncoming monsters in the bumper, flies into a roadblock, passes it, almost collides with the APC and is being driven away from the zone. The passengers are in a complete state of confusion, and the driver is calmly alone with one hand, spinning the steering wheel, the other holding a bottle of beer and every once in a while, he slurps from his throat. There's a Stalker here who's a little awake. He says you learnt to drive somewhere, and the driver laughs. Ha-ha, that's what, I used to work on a minibus in Kiev.

One day, one of the majors got fed up with his free life, and he wanted to the extreme. He's stocked up on the finest armour he can find, I bought the coolest valenza, put everything on it only you can. I ordered the nuts from a jeweller, platinum. Anyway, it's packed to the brim. So I went to the zone. Brazenly drove through a roadblock, hit a sentry with a packet and he's driving through the zone, drinking a bottle of Hanesi and the speakers are blasting some kind of pop. In general, as usual, feel like the master of life. And then, mate, oops, hoarse voice in my brain. Hey, kid, you got a smoke?

So an experienced stalker teaches a newbie how it is in the zone live. What to do to avoid getting into trouble. The young man says, "Imagine this, here we go we're in the zone, and there's monsters on all sides, everything that we've got, and we've only got one round per two of them in your barrel, what are you going to do then, by yourself shoot yourselves and leave me to be slaughtered, or me shoot you and you'll have to find your own way out of it, old man the stalker didn't hesitate. Shit question, you of course, for being a narcissist.

A drunken stalker crawls into a bar on his hands and knees, turns round against the wall and starts crawling upwards. He climbs to the ceiling, then slides down the other wall to the counter. Orders a bottle of vodka, drinks it, takes it out of the backpack artefact, snacks. After that, he turns around and crawls out of the bar. One stalker was stunned, so he says to the other, "Did you see that? and he's like, aah, he's got a bite, you bastard. Not in the old days, it used to be a decent stalker with an artefact snorting.

Stalker comes home late at night. Drunk as a skunk. His wife. You've been drinking with girls in pubs again. Stalker, what's wrong with you? What girls? Patrol outside the zone has been spotted. To the roadblock. Took three hours. I could barely get them to let me in. And you got drunk on vodka out of joy. Bastard. How could I be drunk? I was getting the radiation out. I can't take it home. So Stalker is justifying himself. And the wife is still going on. All right. And for the nipples on your neck. And this one's a bloodsucker. Came round the corner. How's he gonna grab me? All I had on me was a gun. I barely got away. Then his wife smacks him upside the head with a mat. You bastard. Next time you meet your bloodsucker. Pass it on. This lipstick's out of style.

Let's go two rookies into the zone. Before they could even take a couple of steps, a bloodsucker was upon them attacked. The rookies, obviously, asked for guns out of fear. Bloodsucker is tearing the hell out of the last of the causative tissue. But he's still not stopping. That's when the first newcomer from the top of the tree yells at the greenhouse. In the head!
